short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimal extension that clears browsing history on startup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension clears your browsing history in the background everytime you start the browser. It does not do anything else (like touching your cache or cookies).
